dcterms:description: The original PASCAL VOC 2012 dataset contains 1,464 labeled images in the train set and 1,449 images for validation in the val set. It is used for semantic segmentation tasks.
dcterms:title: PASCAL VOC 2012

dcterms:description: Cityscapes dataset is designed for semantic urban scene understanding, containing 2,975 images in the train set and 500 images in the val set.
dcterms:title: Cityscapes

dcterms:description: SBD (Semantic Boundaries Dataset) is used for semantic segmentation tasks, providing additional training images with coarsely annotated labels.
dcterms:title: SBD (Semantic Boundaries Dataset)
